bill.title: A resolution congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2017 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

item.latestTitle: Congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2017 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

item.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. (text of measure as introduced: CR S6655)

item.name: Introduced in Senate
item.text: Recognizes: (1) the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication has helped the Minnesota Lynx win the 2017 Women's National Basketball Association Championship; and (2) the Twin Cities area and Minnesota for supporting women's professional basketball.

item.title: A resolution congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2017 Women's National Basketball Association championship.
A resolution congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2017 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
